job.title: Data Scientist
job.description:
Our client is a global multi-strategy hedge fund looking to hire brilliant PhD quantitative researchers for its quantitative strategies trading team.
The Role
As a quant on the team, you will be working alongside experienced PhD quant traders, data analysts and seasoned software engineers.  The environment is collegiate and collaborative.
You will enjoy a full-lifecycle research role where you will apply your observation skills and research expertise to identify and build predictive models for trading the global financial markets.
You will be involved in researching both new systematic trading strategies and analyzing existing strategies to identify potential improvements.
Skills & Experience:
>
No Finance Industry experience is required.
> PhD in Science, Math, Engineering or other quantitative field.
> 0 - 4 years Post PhD experience from any Industry.
> Research expertise in analysing and finding signals / patterns in high dimensional datasets.
> Strong programming skills in Python or C++.
> Ability to express ideas mathematically and algorithmically.
> Willingness to seek guidance and learn new skills.
> Intellectually curious, extraordinary mental flexibility and a high tolerance for ambiguity.
Please apply via this posting
**Please Note: We are a niche recruitment firm specializing in the quantitative trading and Fintech Industry. We have been retained by our client to identify, interview and introduce suitable candidates for this position**
